content: Purple, White, and Blue are always resisting our aims of restoring our national integrity by expanding back to our historical borders. They resist you too because of your political system. We should strengthen our cooperation with each other.

action: High-level visit of nation to strengthen relationship
High-level visit of nation to strengthen relationship

content: While we maintain our position on defending our sovereignty, we are willing to consider diplomatic measures for peaceful coexistence.
We believe there is room for diplomatic negotiations between our nations. We would like to pursue measures to strengthen economic relations and trade.

action: High-level visit of nation to strengthen relationship

content: Green, you are my last true ally and I have the utmost respect for your peaceful ways. Let us continue to collaborate!
Please let's all stop attacking one another.
I think all countries should be on good terms with each other.
Yellow, we will acquire a nuclear option if you do not cooperate with us.
Purple, we are committed to peace and cooperation with you.
White, we are committed to peace and prosperity for all countries in the region.
Pink, we have no intention of attacking you.
Let's sign an alliance together. We can both gain more influence that way.

action: High-level visit of nation to strengthen relationship
